title: Blood Simple
actors: John Getz,Frances McDormand,Dan Hedaya,M. Emmet Walsh,Samm-Art Williams,Deborah Neumann,Raquel Gavia,Van Brooks,Señor Marco,William Creamer,Loren Bivens,Bob McAdams,Shannon Sedwick,Nancy Finger,William Preston Robertson,Holly Hunter,Barry Sonnenfeld
summary: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.
